template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
struct stVPTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::VPTreeHeader

This type defines the header of the VPTree.

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
char stVPTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::VPTreeHeader::Magic[4]
 

Magic number. This is a short string that must contains the magic string "VP-3". It may be used to validate the file (this feature is not implemented yet).
